info.title: Swagger Auth - OpenAPI 3.0
info.description: Swagger file for wraithlight's auth microservice.

get.summary: Used to check if the given session exists.

401.description: The session is unalive or the given API TOKEN is invalid.

403.description: The user does not have permission to that context.

404.description: The context or the user was not found.

404.description: The context or the session was not found.

get.summary: Used to fetch multiple user information.

401.description: The given API TOKEN is invalid.

post.summary: Used to create a new user (register).

401.description: The given API TOKEN is invalid.

403.description: The given context (by API token) is not allowed to create a new user.

409.description: A user already exists with the same email or username.

401.description: Unauthorized.

post.summary: Used to check if the given email address is used or not.

get.summary: Used to fetch the user information.

401.description: The given API TOKEN is invalid.

patch.summary: Used to update an already existing user (profile edit).

401.description: The given API TOKEN is invalid.

403.description: User with the given session has no access to the given user specified by the userid.

409.description: The given email address is already in use.

delete.summary: Used to delete an already existing user (profile delete).

401.description: The given API TOKEN is invalid.

403.description: User with the given session has no access to the given user specified by the userid.

401.description: Unauthorized.
